select tt.id ,tt.customer_id as customerId, tt.risk_level as maxRiskLevel ,c.num_risk as numRisk,b.chinese_name as customerName,b.card_type as cardType,b.card_id as cardId,a.risk_des as riskDescription from (select * from (select RISK_LIST.*, row_number() over(partition by customer_id order by risk_level desc) cn from RISK_LIST) where cn = 1) tt, (select max(t.risk_level) as aa, count(0) as num_risk, t.customer_id from RISK_LIST t group by t.customer_id) c ,basic_customer_information b ,risk_attribute a where tt.customer_id=c.customer_id and b.id=c.customer_id and a.risk_attribute=tt.risk_attribute and tt.status ='CONFIRMED_CARDCENTER'
AND b.chinese_name like '%${customerName}%'
AND b.card_type=#{cardType}
AND b.card_id like '%${cardId}%'

select t.*,a.risk_des as riskDescription,b.chinese_name as customerName,b.card_type as cardType,b.card_id as cardId from RISK_LIST t, risk_attribute a , basic_customer_information b where a.risk_attribute=t.risk_attribute and t.customer_id=#{customerId} and t.status ='CONFIRMED_CARDCENTER' and b.id=t.customer_id
